name: Chocolate And Coffee Tour Of Notting Hill
description: This tour is for anyone with a serious caffeine addiction (or just a mild interest!). Did you know coffee was originally eaten?  And chocolate was originally only drunk?  On this Coffee & Chocolate tour we will eat and drink both with coffee from some of the finest small-batch roasters, brewed by talented baristas and handmade chocolates and hot chocolate from chocolatiers and makers from around the world.  Coffee and chocolate are a natural pairing.  On this tour we start focused on coffee and then move to chocolate, but there’s the opportunity for more coffee if you want it!
